channel.title: 2004/10 on Ian Wootten
channel.description: Recent content in 2004/10 on Ian Wootten

item.title: Weddings Galore
item.description: I’ve been to so many of my close mates wedding over the last couple of years… In fact I don’t actually think any of the old school crew are still single! Anyway in celebration of this, and Pauls recent marriage to Lisa, I’ve shoved up a gallery to show off some of the pics I have for them. The gallery is located here, and for the blog here’s Paul in his new found role:
